title: PSA: Bloodmoon Aatrox looks hideous ingame, don't get mislead by his sweet splash art!
body:
Splash: 
https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/13601481/Aatrox_Splash_4.jpg
Ingame: 
https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/13601290/blood_moon_aatrox.jpg

Looks like a fucking Nightelf warrior wearing some MOP era transmog and a cash shop helmet, wtf.
Easily the worst ingame model since pizza feet.

replies.body: Sometimes, the art of league goes to levels that the in-game models can never match.
That skin looks really good in game imo

Honestly I think its the lighting in the splash that is misleading. Or, rather, the lack of it.

He's almost completely in shadow and there isn't really any color besides the hints of red. Meanwhile, I'm pretty sure every other Blood Moon splash shows the champion clearly enough that you can get a basic idea for what the skin looks like in game.

His skin could be a bit darker and the rope around his waist could be a bit tighter to better reflect the splash, but honestly, that's my only real complaint. That and his wings look like feather dusters that got mauled by a cat. Those should be a bit fuller and clearly defined as wings instead of some weird blob could just be the angle though.
yes cuz ur supposed to speak for everyone who plays aatrox, k

he actually went from lvl 100 mafia boss to lvl 1 noob
cmon riot this is NOT how mafia works!!!

> [{quoted}](name=FOR JUSTICE,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=86iHJ7Qa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-10T19:06:07.759+0000)
>
> he actually went from lvl 100 mafia boss to lvl 1 noob
> cmon riot this is NOT how mafia works!!!

loool

looks like some Legion Emerald nightmare mog.

but we got the P R E S T I E G E edition tho
I'm sure he is to somebody's liking, but those crusty feet? that weird uncanny human face? the hair? I ain't about that, chief.

yea, i dont like that he's barefoot and is wings look so hollow
also his skin is so pale but in his ult form it looks ok

> [{quoted}](name=GAMOONOE,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=86iHJ7Qa,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2019-05-19T02:46:28.876+0000)
>
> {{champion:266}}

Reviving old threads is against the rules. Please read the rules pinned above. Threads that are couple of months old to years old should not be revived by engaging in the discussion. This thread is old, the discussion has been finished no need to engage again.
I actually like him, his Qs are best of all

It was always this way with the skins. basically, when you are buying skin in this game, is like you are paying for splash art and some ability effects. if they showed actual models instead of arts in store they would lose a lot of sales. i wonder if commissioned art costs more than actual skin model.
It's a rework, of course it's going to look worse.

We're not talking about Aatrox looking uglier than the old Aatrox, nor did Bloodmoon Aatrox exist with the old Aatrox, it's just misleading splash-art to bait you into buying some abomination of a skin lol

> [{quoted}](name=Pyromethius,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=86iHJ7Qa,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-01-10T19:17:25.895+0000)
>
> We're not talking about Aatrox looking uglier than the old Aatrox, nor did Bloodmoon Aatrox exist with the old Aatrox, it's just misleading splash-art to bait you into buying some abomination of a skin lol

I stand by my point.
